00018 bool Connector::open(const Param &param) {
00019   const std::string filename = create_filename
00020       (param.get<std::string>("dicdir"), MATRIX_FILE);
00021   const char *mode = param.get<bool>("open-mutable-dictionary") ?
00022       "r+" : "r";
00023   return open(filename.c_str(), mode);
00024 }
00025 
00026 bool Connector::open(const char* filename,
00027                      const char *mode) {
00028   MMAP_OPEN(short, cmmap_, std::string(filename), mode);
00029 
00030   matrix_ = cmmap_->begin();
00031 
00032   CHECK_CLOSE_FALSE(matrix_) << "matrix is NULL" ;
00033   CHECK_CLOSE_FALSE(cmmap_->size() >= 2)
00034       << "file size is invalid: " << filename;
00035 
00036   lsize_ = static_cast<unsigned short>((*cmmap_)[0]);
00037   rsize_ = static_cast<unsigned short>((*cmmap_)[1]);
00038 
00039   CHECK_CLOSE_FALSE(static_cast<size_t>(lsize_ * rsize_ + 2)
00040                     == cmmap_->size())
00041       << "file size is invalid: " << filename;
00042 
00043   matrix_ = cmmap_->begin() + 2;
00044   return true;
00045 }
00046 
00047 void Connector::close() {
00048   MMAP_CLOSE(short, cmmap_);
00049 }
00050 
00051 bool Connector::openText(const char *filename) {
00052   std::ifstream ifs(filename);
00053   CHECK_CLOSE_FALSE(ifs) <<
00054       "no such file or directory: " << filename;
00055   char *column[2];
00056   char buf[BUF_SIZE];
00057   ifs.getline(buf, sizeof(buf));
00058   CHECK_DIE(tokenize2(buf, "\t ", column, 2) == 2)
00059       << "format error: " << buf;
00060   lsize_ = std::atoi(column[0]);
00061   rsize_ = std::atoi(column[1]);
00062   return true;
00063 }
00064 
00065 bool Connector::compile(const char *ifile, const char *ofile) {
00066   std::ifstream ifs(ifile);
00067   std::istringstream iss(MATRIX_DEF_DEFAULT);
00068   std::istream *is = &ifs;
00069 
00070   if (!ifs) {
00071     std::cerr << ifile
00072               << " is not found. minimum setting is used." << std::endl;
00073     is = &iss;
00074   }
00075 
00076 
00077   char *column[4];
00078   char buf[BUF_SIZE];
00079 
00080   is->getline(buf, sizeof(buf));
00081 
00082   CHECK_DIE(tokenize2(buf, "\t ", column, 2) == 2)
00083       << "format error: " << buf;
00084 
00085   const unsigned short lsize = std::atoi(column[0]);
00086   const unsigned short rsize = std::atoi(column[1]);
00087   std::vector<short> matrix(lsize * rsize);
00088   std::fill(matrix.begin(), matrix.end(), 0);
00089 
00090   std::cout << "reading " << ifile << " ... "
00091             << lsize << "x" << rsize << std::endl;
00092 
00093   while (is->getline(buf, sizeof(buf))) {
00094     CHECK_DIE(tokenize2(buf, "\t ", column, 3) == 3)
00095         << "format error: " << buf;
00096     const size_t l = std::atoi(column[0]);
00097     const size_t r = std::atoi(column[1]);
00098     const int    c = std::atoi(column[2]);
00099     CHECK_DIE(l < lsize && r < rsize) << "index values are out of range";
00100     progress_bar("emitting matrix      ", l + 1, lsize);
00101     matrix[(l + lsize * r)] = static_cast<short>(c);
00102   }
00103 
00104   std::ofstream ofs(ofile, std::ios::binary|std::ios::out);
00105   CHECK_DIE(ofs) << "permission denied: " << ofile;
00106   ofs.write(reinterpret_cast<const char*>(&lsize), sizeof(unsigned short));
00107   ofs.write(reinterpret_cast<const char*>(&rsize), sizeof(unsigned short));
00108   ofs.write(reinterpret_cast<const char*>(&matrix[0]),
00109             lsize * rsize * sizeof(short));
00110   ofs.close();
00111 
00112   return true;
00113 }
